variable.comment: Name of the layer where the guide objects belongs
variable.name: LAYER_GUIDES

variable.comment: Name of the layer where the player belongs
variable.name: LAYER_PLAYER

variable.comment: Name of the layer where bullets are spawned
variable.name: LAYER_BULLETS

variable.comment: If the UI has already been created, the value will be 1
variable.name: WasUICreated

variable.comment: Name of the layout to where the game will redirect after the UI creation
variable.name: LayoutToRedirectTo
